page.title: 07Farming around Bramdean
page.content: There are ten working farms in the area, ranging from small farms of a few acres to very large highly mechanised units. The farms mainly use the small field system and ancient hedgerows have been preserved in most cases. Approximately 1/3 of the farms are arable, 1/3 are arable with pasture and 1/3 have beef cattle. There is also a dairy farm and a farm specialising in intensive egg production. There are also small holdings with free range poultry and produce, 2 of which also keep a house cow. There are 4 beekeepers in the area.
